name: Skype Dark Mode Rainbow Six Siege
description:
From the skype Setting change the theme to dark to see the changed style.

!IMPORTANT! Because of skype data limits and UserStyle code lenght i uploaded the Background in Base64 on my bitBucket: https://bitbucket.org/mxswat/mxs-css-mods/raw/995f083adab269d01f8be0f0f72876cd521a2adc/Backgrounds_Base64/r6Bg.css

From stylish press edit style and paste the content of the URL
